name: part_009
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ生誕祭2024】ｰ COLORFUL ｰ【3DLIVE】 [C-QdqYjdArM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: MC section. Towa and Hakos Baelz talk about their friendship, offline hangouts, and past/future collaborations.
Song performance. Tokoyami Towa performs "Ao no Sumika" (Where Our Blue Is).

subtitles.original: …着替えずにコンビニに寄って…
subtitles.english: ...without changing, we'd stop by a convenience store...

subtitles.original: はい。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: …アイス買って、アイス食べながら散歩して帰るみたいなの結構やってるんだけど…
subtitles.english: ...buy ice cream, and walk home while eating it... we do that quite often.

subtitles.original: そうです！そうです！
subtitles.english: That's right! That's right!

subtitles.original: ま、こうね、なんか3Dライブだけだよね、コラボしての。
subtitles.english: Well, it's only for 3D lives like this that we collab, right?

subtitles.original: 確かに！
subtitles.english: True!

subtitles.original: 本当に最近なんかゲーム配信とかコラボしてないですよね。
subtitles.english: We really haven't done any game stream collabs or anything lately.

subtitles.original: そうなんよね。
subtitles.english: That's true.

subtitles.original: あの、カバー動画とかで結構ずっとお互いのチャンネルでコラボして…
subtitles.english: I mean, we've collabed for a long time with cover videos on each other's channels...

subtitles.original: うん。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: そうだよね。一緒に「Re:Route」を3Dで歌って…
subtitles.english: That's right. Singing "Re:Route" together in 3D...

subtitles.original: …で、今日の「紅蓮華」ここで歌って。でもゲーム配信は…
subtitles.english: ...and singing today's "Gurenge" here. But for game streams...

subtitles.original: …もっとゲームしよう！
subtitles.english: ...let's play more games!

subtitles.original: そうだよね！
subtitles.english: True!

subtitles.original: そうだよね。そうなんですよね。
subtitles.english: Right. That's right.

subtitles.original: もっとゲームしよう！
subtitles.english: Let's play more games!

subtitles.original: ゲームを、じゃあ…
subtitles.english: Games, then...

subtitles.original: 直近に…
subtitles.english: Soon...

subtitles.original: 鼻水出た…
subtitles.english: (Laughs) My nose is running...

subtitles.original: はい。
subtitles.english: Yes.

subtitles.original: やりたいと思います！
subtitles.english: I'd like to do it!

subtitles.original: やりたいと思います！
subtitles.english: I'd like to do it!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで…
subtitles.english: Okay! So...

subtitles.original: ま、「紅蓮華」はね、あのベェが歌がね、上手でかっこいい声歌えるので…
subtitles.english: Well, for "Gurenge", since Bae is a good singer and can sing with a cool voice...

subtitles.original: …一緒に歌いたいと思って選びました。
subtitles.english: ...I chose it because I wanted to sing it together.

subtitles.original: いやいやいや、何言ってるんですか！
subtitles.english: No no no, what are you saying!

subtitles.original: トワ先輩！先輩の方がね…
subtitles.english: Towa-senpai! Senpai is the one...

subtitles.original: …なんかそんな…こんなにかっこいい、大好きな先輩と…
subtitles.english: ...with such... with such a cool, favorite senpai...

subtitles.original: …なんかこの…あの「紅蓮華」歌えてできて嬉しいです。とても。
subtitles.english: ...I'm happy to be able to sing "Gurenge" like this. Very.

subtitles.original: ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thanks.

subtitles.original: なんかちょっと恥ずかしいから次行くか。
subtitles.english: It's a bit embarrassing, so shall we move on?

subtitles.original: あ！
subtitles.english: Ah!

subtitles.original: あ、ということで、次の曲へ！
subtitles.english: Ah, so, on to the next song!

subtitles.original: どうぞ！
subtitles.english: Here you go!

subtitles.original:
青のすみか
－作詞・作曲：Tatsuya Kitani－
subtitles.english:
Where Our Blue Is
- Lyrics & Composition: Tatsuya Kitani -

subtitles.original: どこまでも続くようなあの季節は
subtitles.english: That season that seemed to go on forever

subtitles.original: いつ並ぶ まだこの前を遮るものは何もない
subtitles.english: When lined up, there is still nothing blocking our path

subtitles.original: アスファルト 蝉時雨を反射して
subtitles.english: Reflecting off the asphalt and the chorus of cicadas

subtitles.original: 君という沈黙が聞こえなくなる
subtitles.english: The silence that is you becomes inaudible

subtitles.original: この日々が色褪せる
subtitles.english: These days fade

subtitles.original: 僕と違う君の匂いを知ってしまっても
subtitles.english: Even if I come to know your scent, different from mine

subtitles.original: 時をすべて期待の永遠の底に
subtitles.english: Leaving all time at the bottom of an expected eternity

subtitles.original: 今でも青が澄んでいる
subtitles.english: Even now, the blue still dwells

subtitles.original: 今でも青は澄んでいる
subtitles.english: Even now, the blue is dwelling

subtitles.original: どんな祈りも言葉も
subtitles.english: No matter the prayers or words

subtitles.original: 近づけるのに届かなかった
subtitles.english: They didn't reach, despite getting closer

subtitles.original: まるで静かな恋のような
subtitles.english: Just like a quiet love

subtitles.original: 頬を伝った夏のような色の中
subtitles.english: Inside the color like a summer that trickled down my cheek

subtitles.original: 君を呪う言葉が
subtitles.english: The words cursing you

subtitles.original: ずっと喉の奥に閊えてる
subtitles.english: Have always been stuck in the back of my throat

subtitles.original: また会えるよねって
subtitles.english: Saying "We'll meet again, right?"

subtitles.original: 声にならない声
subtitles.english: A voiceless voice

subtitles.original: 昼下がり 沁みつく風の季節は
subtitles.english: In the early afternoon, the season of the clinging wind

subtitles.original: 想い馳せる まだ何者でもなかった僕らの肖像
subtitles.english: I think back to our portraits when we were still nobodies

subtitles.original: 何もかも分かち合えたはずだったあの日から少しずつ
subtitles.english: From that day when we were supposed to share everything, little by little

subtitles.original: 君と違う僕という呪いが肥っていく
subtitles.english: The curse that is me, different from you, grows larger

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔の奥の憂いを
subtitles.english: The grief deep within your smile

subtitles.original: 見落としたこと 悔やみ尽くして
subtitles.english: Regretting having overlooked it completely

subtitles.original: 徒花と咲いて散っていく
subtitles.english: Blooming and falling like a fruitless flower

subtitles.original: 君にさよなら
subtitles.english: Farewell to you

subtitles.original: さよなら
subtitles.english: Goodbye

subtitles.original: 今でも青が澄んでいる
subtitles.english: Even now, the blue still dwells

subtitles.original: 今でも青は澄んでいる
subtitles.english: Even now, the blue is dwelling

subtitles.original: どんな祈りも言葉も
subtitles.english: No matter the prayers or words

subtitles.original: 近づけるのに届かなかった
subtitles.english: They didn't reach, despite getting closer

subtitles.original: まるで静かな恋のような
subtitles.english: Just like a quiet love

subtitles.original: 頬を伝った夏のような色の中
subtitles.english: Inside the color like a summer that trickled down my cheek

subtitles.original: 君を呪う言葉が
subtitles.english: The words cursing you

subtitles.original: ずっと喉の奥に閊えてる
subtitles.english: Have always been stuck in the back of my throat

subtitles.original: また会えるよねって
subtitles.english: Saying "We'll meet again, right?"

subtitles.original: 声にならない声
subtitles.english: A voiceless voice

subtitles.original: 無限に膨張する銀河の星の粒のように指の隙
subtitles.english: Like grains of stars in a galaxy expanding to infinity, between my fingers...
